channel.title: About_files on Ezekiel Haggart
channel.description: Recent content in About_files on Ezekiel Haggart

item.description: So you want to add a layer? Yay! go add it to the leaflet-providers.js as long as it follows the following rules: Don’t violate a providers TOS (if it exists, include a link to it) Don’t pre-populate api keys with working keys. It should be a basic tile source, no exteral libraries etc. The owner hasn’t asked us to remove it (hasn’t happened yet)
